website_summaries.verdict: A good step up from the most affordable Shure headphones while still being reasonably priced.
pros: Includes a long cord and produces great, clear sound with a strong bass
Sturdy enough to hold up to regular use
cons: These headphones can fit a little tight on some people

customer_reviews.title: They are fragile but sound great!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound terrific and are super comfortable!! I have to use headphones every day. I ordered a few pairs of these. The problem is, they break, where the headphone swivels. I have had to glue three sets back together, in order to continue using them.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a while back and they are still just as I bought them. Great quality especially for the price. I use them for editing,but they are great for anything including travel. Great gift idea as well! They come with a very nice bag to keep them in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: I mostly bought cheap headphones, but decided to buy headphones of a little more quality. The clarity of sound from these headphones amazes me. I notice a lot more instruments and percussion in the recordings than I could with lesser headphones. In addition, I noticed my lesser headphones needed twice the volume that these headphones require, which translates to less battery usage for portable devices. To me, these headphones are worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn LF

customer_reviews.title: SHURE SRH240A Headphone.
customer_reviews.text: I received this headphones from Amazon.com today. I'm really impressed about the material quality and the sound quality of this headphone. I have a small audio production studio where I use this headphones. Mostly I use the headphone connected to the Asus Xonar Essence STX Audiophile soundcard in my computer. The sound quality that the headphone reproduce are exelent, deep bass, exact right mid-tone and discant. I can garantee that everyone will be satisfied with the Shure SRH240A Professional Headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Ivar Aronsen.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my granddaughter who is at here ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter who is at here laptop as soon as she gets home from school. Whether it is listening to music or doing her homework, it is ideal for her so she can concentrate on her projects for school and she can be in our company without us listening to her music or games.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Fry

customer_reviews.title: SHURE is the best in the industry for a reason
customer_reviews.text: By far the best headphones on the market at this price point. Solidly constructed with a sturdy size adjustment mechanism, and a comfortable fit that does not cause head or ear ache over extended periods. The sound quality is fantastic and lives up to the Shure reputation for excellence. I would do recommend these headphones to friends and colleagues, and could not be happier with my purchase. If I ever decide to upgrade to higher-end listening experience, I will undoubtedly select a product from the Shure SRH line. You just can't beat these!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Langer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality For The $
customer_reviews.text: As an audio engineer, I'm always on the look out for new headphones. A coworker of mine has these and the Shure SRH840. Hey said they were both great. I tried them out and saw he was right. But I wasn't looking to spend $100. So I went ahead and got these. I mainly use them as reference to check mixes/just listening to music at home. Def a great pair of headphones to have in your arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Bassfingerz

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional audio tech for a sound company. I bought these for my nephew for Christmas and gave them a test run first. They easily beat out some headphones I've heard off of the shelf from your more mainstream consumer brands. Are these headphones for you? It depends on what you're looking for. I would not mix audio with them, but I would listen to mp3s. I don't think they try to replicate the true range of sound, but to give you the range you typically end up turning up on your ipod anyway. Bass and treble! Still covers the mid-range decently though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baur

customer_reviews.title: SRH240 Headphone
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1)Perfect Design. 2)Black shiny sides. 3)High quality headband and ear cushions leathers. 4)Long headphone cord. 5)golden connector. 6)Adjustable headphone (you could just adjust the height of it). 7)Clear sound. 8)Nice SHURE brand on the side (from shiny metal). 9)High durability. Cons: 1)Sometimes I can't hear the voice or the music clearly so I should rotate or play with the connector to hear it clearly,but I am not sure that the problem is from my laptop or the headphone, I just wanted to say it. 2)A little bit high price. Overall-----PERFECT-------90% BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Redman

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality on them is terrible. It's like listening through tin cans
customer_reviews.text: I'm really unsure how they can call these "professional quality". The sound quality on them is terrible. It's like listening through tin cans.
customer_reviews.author: Lyrical

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, creaky hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the best sound for dollars spent, but for studio use, the hard plastic creaks slightly when a performer moves their head.
customer_reviews.author: Thor

customer_reviews.title: NO GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for an animation class I am in which demands "professional" headphones. Unfortunately, these do not suction my ears to create a "noise-blocking" experience. The sound is fine, but considering the gap between my ears and the headphones, I cannot justify the cost. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best cans I own. Very clear with great treble and bass------well balanced. I listen to all types of music, pleased with the sound of these headphones. Also they are very comfortable and you can wear them for long listening sessions. IGreat for ljazz too. Five stars----highly reccomend these cans by Shure.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphone
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Sennheiser, which in itself is a pretty good headphone for its price. This one is much better than the Sennheiser. I'm by no means an expert in sound quality, I just listen to my IPOD about 8 hours a day so I do appreciate good balance in the sound of my music. This headphone offers that. The bass comes out booming, while the vocal is not buried under all the instruments. Listening to classical music becomes such a joy, while hip/hop sounds a lot trendier. I definitely think that this is worth the money that I pay for it :)
customer_reviews.author: E. Laksana

customer_reviews.title: Headphones provided great sound quality and have nice ear cushions
customer_reviews.text: Headphones provided great sound quality and have nice ear cushions. Overall the product is very good and serves its purpose up to my standards. The thing i wish Shure could of done differently was make the ear cushions over sized because long periods of use will result in sore ears. Although this problem may be due to the fact i wear glasses. I would recommend to a friend because of the great price to performance ratio 9/10.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Y.

customer_reviews.title: USE STUDIO MIXER TO GET THE BEST SOUND WITH A PARAMETRIC EQ.
customer_reviews.text: YOU CAN GET THE BEST SOUND OUT OF STUDIO MIXER WITH A PARAMETRIC EQ.PROBABLY ONE OF THE BEST HEADPHONES FOR THE MONEY.OUTSTANDING SOUND QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy & great sound
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are just what I wanted. Over the ear so I don't have to take out my hearing aids and with a great balance of frequencies that make it perfect for listening to classical music. Allow a reasonable amount of background noise in, but I did not want complete noise cancelling. Overall the best for the money.
customer_reviews.author: materials man

customer_reviews.title: These Headphones are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. A Fellow Voice Over Artist recommended them and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Michalla Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Best headphone for the money that I’ve used. Headphones have survived the beating they have taken, and still work great.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: good sound
customer_reviews.text: it comes in a box that's very nice, like pros, the cushion cover you ears, in the beginning I thought the sound is nothing exceptional but after i set my equalizer to listen electronica and dubstep the sound was very different I was able to listen sounds i didn't hear before, i go to DD many times to use the internet while listening music with my headphones they look a little big but my friends tryed it and they like the sound too
customer_reviews.author: Will Lopez

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these can't be beat. Speaking of beat, I have a pair of Beats by Dr. Dre. There is no comparison... these are way, way better. The sound is amazing & the price is just as amazing. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I can finally get work done in a shared office space!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these. I share an office space with three other people. While these aren't quite as noise-cancelling as some I've heard, it knocks out a TON of noise and helps me get work done faster.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Craine

customer_reviews.title: Best phones for actually listening to music
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy Dr Dre/ Apple Beats if you are looking for true audio quality. I'm not making this up. The headphones went head to head with $300-$400 phones and won! Dre wins for fashion
customer_reviews.author: Steve Folsom

customer_reviews.title: Quality Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife to wear at work and she loves them. They are not too heavy on her head, wearing them the majority of the day, everyday during work. She loves the sound and the decent noise cancellation they provide. While not the most expensive pair that we have, they are great for daily use at work.
customer_reviews.author: Troublebaker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I find headphones that fit in or around the ear frequently uncomfortable. I _hate_ earbuds. These, however, are the most comfortable headphones I've ever owned. They could be a little better at blocking external sounds, but the audio quality is good, and I can wear them for extended periods without my ears getting tired. They also expand enough to fit large heads.
customer_reviews.author: Xiao Long

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones, lacking sound isolation for drumset use.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are nice but I was hoping they would be heavier and block out more sound. I use these as studio monitors on my drum kit. They don't keep out external noise that well. Sound quality is good though.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is great, but the bass leaves a bit to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, but the bass leaves a bit to be desired. The cable is REALLY long and permanently attached. Not complaining, but I'd prefer it to be either a bit shorter so I don't trip on it, or make it removable so I can replace with a shorter cable.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C.

customer_reviews.title: I have a wall full of Shure headphones in my studio for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: I have three pair of the SRH240A's, two pair of the previous SRH240's and one pair of the SRH440's. The Sure headphones work great in my studio and because the impedance is the same, I can run 8 pair per headphone distribution amp. The newer SRH240A sounds better than its predecessor .
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert A. Vipraio

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a non expensive headphones with a good sound quality and I could found in this Shure ...
customer_reviews.text: I did a huge search before buy it and I can say that it worth for the price. I was looking for a non expensive headphones with a good sound quality and I could found in this Shure headphones. I would recommend it for everyone. The only thing I really regret is not have bought the coiled cable.
customer_reviews.author: Fabiane

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for a small, casual home studio
customer_reviews.text: These make me wonder why I waited so many years to get a decent set of headphones for monitoring. These turned out to be a great choice for a small, casual home studio. They're comfortable, and the audio is very clean.
customer_reviews.author: D. Michael McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Dope!
customer_reviews.text: Superior sound. Wish I had theses when I had a Walkman. I mean cassettes if you know what those are.
customer_reviews.author: Jon ibba

customer_reviews.title: Sound is very thin and just lacking especially the bass ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is very thin and just lacking especially the bass, theres little to NONE AT ALL!!! But when this price range is what you can afford you can't really complain, so hence the saying "if you buy cheap expect cheap and etc". Even if you try to tweek the eq it'll still be lacking in bass.
customer_reviews.author: Bellande

customer_reviews.title: No bass, no highs - everything is in the middle
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have a nice midrange but lack bass response and high treble also. The imaging is not bad, but overall, there are better headphones out there for the money. Now if you are listening to spoken vocal recordings or A Capella music, these would shine.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction!
customer_reviews.text: Within days of ordering, my Shure SRH240 Headphones arrived in perfect condition and have more than lived up to my expectations. The headphones aren't tight around the ears/head (in fact, they provide much welcome breathing room - but not too much), and the cups effectively block out background noise. The sound quality is amazing. In my experience, the headphones allow me to hear every little note and whisper (for music as well as TV/DVD movies/online programming). I've used them daily since getting them in February 2010, and I'm still thrilled by their quality.
customer_reviews.author: Serena White

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for price. I keep buying new ones simply because my cat keeps chewing on the chord. :( I just have to remember to place them back into the bag. (Sold separately)
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting a better bass sound.
customer_reviews.text: Was kind of disappointed because Shure is such a well known/used brand for musicians. The bass was just barely there. :(
customer_reviews.author: patchoulimoonxx

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are great sounding headphones. They are comfortable on my head and they have no overpowering tone. Bass, mid, and treble all balanced with these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: huge quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The wires are a little thin and probably apt to pull out or break, but at this price point, I'm willing to deal with it. The phones are comfy, and provide plenty of good sound for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jon the Art Guy

customer_reviews.title: My third set of these headphones in 5 years. ...
customer_reviews.text: My third set of these headphones in 5 years. I do a lot of recording and you cannot beat the clean, warm sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased three sets of Shure SRH240 Headphones to be used with our new Touch Screen Hearing Kiosk. We needed a high quality product at a reasonable price. We got both along with fast delivery. I'll be buying more headsets soon. W Willard [...]
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with these, sound seems good to me, they cover the ear and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Package, No headphone replacement pads
customer_reviews.text: I bought this package with the Focusrite Scarlett 2i2 and Shure headphones as a gift. I'm so happy with this purchase and so is the person I got it for. The only issue is the headphones did not come with replacement ear pad as was described. There was not a place to contact the seller directly so unfortunately I have to do it on this public platform.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wu

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing headphones. I have tried many brands to use while I play drums. I use these as my monitor as I perform with my band and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Varisco

customer_reviews.title: Shur SRH240 Review
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with them so far. In terms of sound quality, they perform as great as I had hoped. They are significantly cheaper than some of the other options I considered. The only criticism I can give is the overall design leaves a bit to be desired. They are larger than some of the other options, and the cable connects to both ears instead of just one.
customer_reviews.author: RFRichholt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful earphones. Great sound, comfortable, nice looking. No complaints. I purchased these for use with our Droid X as well as the Shure SE115-K earbuds (which are more expensive)...these win by far! Very happy with both but these sound better by far!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Keep all the music for yourself
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality set of headphones. The sound is great and the people around aren't having to listen to whatever my granddaughter is listening to. Very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Eldonna C. Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to get nice set of headphones for my husband who loves to listen to his music. These headphones were recommended by my daughter for their quality and comfort. They measured up to our expectations and more.
customer_reviews.author: koliver23

customer_reviews.title: Shure SRH240 Professional Quality Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones as a gift for my son. He loves them! I feel they were purchased at a good price and we got them sooner than anticipated. Definitely will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones for about $50
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pair of headphones for the price. It is very well made and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lui

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound quality, very confortable to use. Bass looks very natural, but you can hear every detail very clear, i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Good sound reproduction, if using for recording, they don't sit tight on the head so you will get headphone bleed.
customer_reviews.author: Colin and Rachel Whitehurst

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, bad design.
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these headphones was great, but the overall quality of the headset is extremely problematic. The plug fit very snugly into our ipad--and broke off inside within a month. There was absolutely no way to get it out, leaving the ipad with no sound at all. Apple was kind enough to replace the ipad--even though their product was not at fault. I would not recommend these headphones, as they might damage your device.
customer_reviews.author: narrowback slacker

customer_reviews.title: Shure Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I like how the feel! I had Koss headphones before and they don't hurt my ears cause how they fit!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Billotte

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the bucks
customer_reviews.text: Easy listening, light on the head and it's got the style. Just one comment though... I wish the headphone was wired on just one side. But at the price I've paid for I'm satisfied. x]
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these simply for music-listening purposes. I wanted good over-ear headphones that weren't super expensive and these are perfect for that. They're comfortable, good quality, and effective noise-canceling. For someone looking for good personal headphones, these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but not great...
customer_reviews.text: The price is not bad for these. The construction is a little flimsy, and the small connector fits poorly with most inputs or adapters. The sound is decent for the price, and they are rather comfortable. Adjustability is only okay. Really very light if you need them to move around, but that costs badly in low end response. If I'd paid $40 for them that would feel about right. They are not in any way good enough for mixing or mastering. Not bad for listening at medium volume though in a quiet location.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the money. The sound is clear and sharp. For the money a great buy. I use these guys to listen to podcasts for hours at a time and are comfortable. They reduce a lot of the background noise and they look awesome! Cons: wish that it had a stronger basse (the mids and the highs are outstanding). Another thing is that I wish that the earpieces swivel.
customer_reviews.author: YllMatic

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: These are not worht $50. I would pay $20-$25. The sound is not clear. I have bought a lot of Shure products that I would recommend, but I would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Z Rodis

customer_reviews.title: Good sonic isolation
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Good sonic isolation, best for this price I've seen for recording. 4 star review for the thin cables it has -possibly their only flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: right ear no sound after 2 month
customer_reviews.text: Bought the product on Sept 23, 2011. It works. But the sound quality was not impressive. Better than the one comes with my iPhone. It works for over 2 month. Then there is no sound from the right ear. Tried with other earphone, no problem with my iPhone. Called Shure for warranty and was asked to ship the product back to them. But I have to pay for the shipping, about $15 for priority shipping at USPS. Don't want to waste more money on this earphone any more. I will just trash it get get a better one.
customer_reviews.author: K. Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does meet my expectations. I just wish that the cable were longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jose J Martinez

customer_reviews.title: for price its good
customer_reviews.text: i record for hours a day the SRH240A meets my expectations there is other reviews with hundreds of words on them so if you want to know more about the pros and cons go read those instead but quality is good but here is one thing IF YOU SAY THESE LACK IN BASS IM GOING TO YELL AT YOU BECAUSE THESE ARE NOT FOR YOUR EXCITEMENT NOR FOR HAVING THE BEST BASS JUNKIE EXPERIENCE THESE ARE FOR DJ'S THAT RECORD MUSIC TO HEAR THE CLEAREST IN SOUND
customer_reviews.author: Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to SRH440
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I just robbed Shure. These are great quality headphones at an even better price. Perfect frequency response and also perfect for mixing purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Moorer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible! Better than Bose and Beats by Dr. Dre!
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible. No matter what those other reviews say, these are incredible headphone, with incredible sound, comfort, and quality. It's Shure! I used to use the headphones from apple that they gave you when you bought an iPod, iPad, or iPhone, and I have to say, these are great! The bass and treble are great! Better than Bose, or Beats by Dr. Dre! A Must-Buy! Well worth your money. They come with the small jack for iPods, etc. and then a screw-on addition for plugging into music equipment like keyboards, etc.
customer_reviews.author: simonw2276

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audiophile, I just use the headphones for listening to music and making mixes on my laptop. They work great, comfortable to wear. Noise isolating is a little weak, but overall for the price, quality, and comfort they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes its a great product, and I love this product a lot and it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good, comfortable headphones
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Good, comfortable headphones. Wish cord were a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pair on sale for $40 and they sound as good as my $99 pair. The only downside is a very long cord, if that is something that would annoy you. They are best used for recording. Very comfortable and durable design.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Too big broke quick
customer_reviews.text: they were poorly made one side lost sound in a week and THE OTHER pair lost sound another week later. Not good sound no bass. Also the actual plug is too big
customer_reviews.author: Adam Weaver

customer_reviews.title: It's one of the best headphones I've used
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Though, the build quality isn't really sturdy. But, for this price it's exceptional. The sound is fa-nominal.
customer_reviews.author: random

customer_reviews.title: plug is loose
customer_reviews.text: i have had these headphones for about a month. i use these 4/5 times a week. the plug has become very loose at does not stay tight so the music comes on and off and switches ears.
customer_reviews.author: john w monteiro jr.

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with the product that I purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. I just wish that they were a little more low profile. Great sound quality. Love the fact others cant hear what I am hearing at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Noga

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Im not a music pro let alone any kind of audio genious, I walk around campus and use these at work every day. No complaints, they work very well and I was EXTREMELY satisfied for the price. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Brandub

customer_reviews.title: COOL headphones
customer_reviews.text: They are very best what I expect, the sound is great and works terrific when I play the the drums,
customer_reviews.author: HSP

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones! Great sound! Couldnt ask for any better for the price. Definitely recommend them. You could not go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P Sciancalepore

customer_reviews.title: good headphones
customer_reviews.text: i've had these headphones for not even a day now and i already love em, they are very comfortable to wear and the sound quality is very clear, not as much bass in the headphones as i thought but i purchased the FiiO amp with it so it makes up for it
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound...but not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Had these for about 6 months as studio headphones. Sounded good and then the wires shorted out at the plug under normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Allen

customer_reviews.title: Headphone jack broke
customer_reviews.text: Loved these headphones, they had great sound. But the cord broke right above the headphone jack, and I had to buy new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: its great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: the sound quality and clarity is great but they dont have as much bass as i would have liked. they are very comfortable and they dont look retarded soooooo, all this for 50 bucks, great deal
customer_reviews.author: Justin Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great mic quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got these today. Everyone I have talked to said it sounded like I was talking directly on my iphone. Great price and very comfortbale since I talk on the phone all day for my job. Sound is also great when listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: Marine01

customer_reviews.title: Great Phones
customer_reviews.text: These studio headphones are great for listening to my music, it really plays the highs and lows, not missing any part of the music. I would recommend these to anyone who want some quality on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: soccercheese33

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The comfort is not there. That is my only complaint. ultimately these have ruined my concept of what good quality audio is. Just pure awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Bourne. Jason

customer_reviews.title: nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: man ive gone thru so many pairs of studio headphones, but once i found these n at such a great price it was GAME OVER. lol
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within months
customer_reviews.text: One of the earphones stopped working within a few weeks of purchase. Sound quality was great until it failed completely.
customer_reviews.author: christian flaherty

customer_reviews.title: not as great
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my Iphone. The mic is good but the sound quality out of the headset is no where near Grado or any other decent manufacturer. Unhappy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Venugopal

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, looks good, fits great, and my son is pleased with this purchase! His only complaint is the cord is very long to use with an iPod. It would be fine with a stereo.
customer_reviews.author: K. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones for the price. They drown out all the squawkers in my office which is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: We got for our grandson last year, someone broke his, he loved it, so we got him another one for xmas.
customer_reviews.author: grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the $
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are definitely worth the price. I picked them up for $40 and I am very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cheese2010

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Extremely big for a women's head and therefore it's not soundproof.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shure 240a
customer_reviews.text: Believe what other people write about the lack of bass on these. Isnt the richest when it comes to sound quality but it does do a good good at blocking out noise. Overall I thought that I got a decent quality headphone for a really low price. Knowing what I know now I would had probally went with the Shure 440
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: great! while they work...
customer_reviews.text: these headphones put out amazing quality, but, after a month, the left cup stopped working, now the right and left, no longer help. probably a defective unit, but i don't know. if you know an answer to my problem, please tell em!
customer_reviews.author: ben dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for the price. I love them. They look good, and the sound quality is nice. I would definitely buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: shure doesn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: very true sound in when mixing down. I've used many different kinds of headphones and these are always my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: M. Echlin

customer_reviews.title: almost there
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, a little bulky though. Could be lighter and more compact.
customer_reviews.author: Jihea

customer_reviews.title: I dig 'em!
customer_reviews.text: I dig 'em. For the price - they're some btch'in headphones! Comfortable & durable! Sound quality is pretty good for the price! Are they an adequate replacement for your Bose headphones that some a-hole broke... nope.
customer_reviews.author: J. Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: I really like these but I am not a big bass man ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these but I am not a big bass man and I think that if you are you might not like them as well. they sure do beat the ones that came with it and they get outstanding reviews compared to many really expensive headphone
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: Seem good quality
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for teenage son and he seems very happy with the sound-quality and style. He also says they are comfy to wear for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: these headphone are legit. great sound. good bas. feel lik your wearing turtle beaches times 100000000000000. pleases buy these. better then skullcandy and these and beats by dre are about tied!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: cool cat 79

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound, not too good product
customer_reviews.text: Decent headphones, nothing serious, has no real base to it. Wouldnt suggest you buy if its for producing or recording. Plus one of the headphones gave out not too long after i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: David

product_meta.title: Shure SRH240A Professional Quality Headphones (Black)
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingReproducing full bass with detailed highs, the SRH240A is ideal for vivid listening on almost any device. The closed-back, circumaural design rests comfortably over the ears and reduces background noise. The ear cushions on the SRH240A are replaceable and a carrying pouch and threaded ¼-Inch adapter are included.
feature_bullets: Note this version of the product is from another country
This international version does not include a warranty in the US
This products is materially the same as the US version, but the packaging is different
